name: Backcountry Access Snow Saw
description: The ultimate tool for snowpack analysis, this snow saw also cuts ice and even wood. The glass-filled nylon handle can be attached to an extendable pole with a 14 or 16mm clamp to keep you far away from cornices and allow for easier snow column cutting for tests.Laser-etched centimetre markings on the blade as well as 1mm and 3mm crystal cards.Blade length is 35cm and overall length is 48cm.Nylon blade cover included.
